item.title: The Dynamic Habitat Indices (DHIs) from MODIS and global biodiversity
item.description: Related materials The Dynamic Habitat Indices (DHIs) summarize #remotesensing data on annual #productivity in way that is highly relevant for #biodiversity analyses - Radeloff VC et al #RemoteSensingOfEnvironment https://t.co/j2fC21hPwU — 𝐆𝐈𝐎 𝐑𝐀𝐏𝐀𝐂𝐂𝐈𝐔𝐎𝐋𝐎 (@giorapac) January 7, 2019
